name: Universidad de los Andes
brief: Founded in 1948, one of Colombia's top-ranked universities.

name: Pontificia Universidad Javeriana
brief: Founded in 1623. One of the oldest, and prestigious universities in Colombia.

name: Universidad Nacional de Colombia
brief: Established in 1867 by Colombia's Congress, it's one of the country's largest universities.

name: Universidad de La Sabana
brief: Private university founded in 1979 by the association for teaching Aspaen. Located in Chía, Colombia.

name: Universidad Externado de Colombia
brief: A respected university producing graduates in law, journalism, and government.

name: Universidad de Antioquia
brief: founded in 1803 by a Royal Decree, and receiving a high quality accreditation from the Ministry of Education for 9 years.

name: Universidad Pontificia Bolivariana
brief: Established in 1936. As of June 2022, UPB ranks top 4 in Colombia, and top 30 in LATAM.

name: Universidad Nacional de Rosario
brief: Founded in 1968, UNR began with multiple academic and administrative units.

name: Universidad del Valle
brief: Home to faculties in Engineering, Humanities, Arts, Sciences, Social Sciences, Economics, Education, Pedagogy, and Psychology.

name: Universidad de Antioquia
brief: A private Colombian university in Medellín, offering 23 undergrad programs, 70 specializations, 34 master's degrees, and six doctoral programs.
